result.title: SQRT-Decomposition
result.content:
five types of problem that can be solved using sqrt decomposition. (http://acm.math.spbu.ru/~sk1/mm/lections/mipt2016-sqrt/mipt-2016-burunduk1-sqrt.en.pdf) courtesy- Sergey Kopeliovich

another resource on sqrt decomposition (https://youtu.be/b6QhQSnKNSc)
